A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of action\, beautiful imagery\, and lots of things getting blown up! The story\, on the other hand\, was similar to taking a mud bath in a sewer! Nothing was answered! The space battle was a joke! And THAT was not our Luke Skywalker! What a disrespectful way to treat the flagship character of Star Wars! It seems like Disney's long term plan is to erase George Lucas from his own creation\, so when people think Star Wars in the future\, the only names that come to mind are Rey and Disney. Sorry\, not my Star Wars! This is nothing more than a cheap reboot imitation! If Rian Johnson (What an appropriate sir name) writes episode nine\, I will not see it!
